articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Google Workspace gets automation flows, podcast-style summaries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is upgrading Workspace, its suite of cloud-based productivity tools, with new AI-powered capabilities, including an automation tool called Workspace Flows.
